## heuristics package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [contract(predicate, message)](./heuristics.contract.md) | Generate a contractually-bound predicate |
|  [isAnonymousFunction(testValue)](./heuristics.isanonymousfunction.md) | Test whether a given value is an anonymous function |
|  [isArray(testValue)](./heuristics.isarray.md) | Test whether a given value is an array |
|  [isAsyncFunction(testValue)](./heuristics.isasyncfunction.md) | Test whether a given value is an async function |
|  [isBoolean(testValue)](./heuristics.isboolean.md) | Test whether a given value is a Boolean |
|  [isDefined(testValue)](./heuristics.isdefined.md) | Determine whether a given value is \_\_not\_\_ undefined |
|  [isError(testValue)](./heuristics.iserror.md) | Test whether a given value is an Error |
|  [isExtant(testValue)](./heuristics.isextant.md) | Determine whether an argument is neither null, nor undefined |
|  [isFloat(testValue)](./heuristics.isfloat.md) | Test whether a given value is a floating point number |
|  [isFunction(testValue)](./heuristics.isfunction.md) | Test whether a given value is a function, including async and generator functions |
|  [isGenerator(testValue)](./heuristics.isgenerator.md) | Test whether a given value is a generator function |
|  [isNonNull(testValue)](./heuristics.isnonnull.md) | Determine whether a given value is \_\_not\_\_ null |
|  [isNumber(testValue)](./heuristics.isnumber.md) | Test whether a given value is a number |
|  [isObject(testValue)](./heuristics.isobject.md) | Test whether a given value is a plain object |
|  [isString(testValue)](./heuristics.isstring.md) | Test whether a given value is a string |
|  [not(testValue)](./heuristics.not.md) | Convert an expression or value to a negated boolean cast of itself |
|  [notEmpty(testValue)](./heuristics.notempty.md) | Determine whether the given object, array, or string is \_\_not\_\_ empty |
|  [notInPrototype(testObj, prop)](./heuristics.notinprototype.md) | Determine if a property does \_\_not\_\_ exist on an object or its prototype chain |
|  [range(start, end)](./heuristics.range.md) | Generate an iterable range |
|  [requires(condition, message)](./heuristics.requires.md) | Require a condition, else throw |
|  [testForEach(predicates)](./heuristics.testforeach.md) | Generate a function that accepts a test value on which n predicates are enforced |
